newsitem.title: SPAIN: Forecast - Spain CPI consensus sees 0.23% April rise.
newsitem.headline: Forecast - Spain CPI consensus sees 0.23% April rise.

text.p: The following is a simple average of CPI forecasts contributed by private economists:
Mth Change Range Pvs Yr-yr Range 96/95 Ave

Sources: Intermoney, AFI, Argentaria, Banco Santander, BBV, BSN, ICAE, Merrill Lynch, Fedea, Caja Cataluna, Beta Capital, C. Madrid, Wrightson Ass, 4cast, U. Carlos III-Price Waterhouse, BCH, Tokai Bank, BOA, ABN AMRO.
NOTE - The National Statistics Institute will publish the official figure on May 14. Core inflation excludes energy and unprocessed food.
